title: On Saturday July 22 at 11:45am, four (4) marked Brunswick County sheriff\'s deputy cars and two patrol motorcycles stopped traffic between Belville and Leland to escort 25 members of a motorcycle club to Navassa. All the while, traffic was at a complete standstill along the 74/76 causeway between Leland and Wilmington due to the heavy traffic that occurs every single Saturday between 10am and 2pm. Why does the motorcycle club get a six patrol vehicle escort when the officers could have been helping to alleviate this weekly traffic jam?
